head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths VALLONEY, (VALLONE), FRANK E., SR.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths VALLONEY, (VALLONE), FRANK E., SR.

block.p: VALLONEY - (VALLONE) - Frank E., Sr. (fondly known as the Mayor of 231st St). On June 5, 2000, 80 years. Worked for Electro TypersUnion 100. Active for many years with the 50th Precinct-PAL and a member of the William E. Irwin American Legion Post. Beloved husband of the late Doris (nee Valvo), loving father of Joan Cybulski and the late Frank, Jr. Devoted grandfather of Donna Baraichi and Rose Cybulski. Great-grandfather of Rachael. Family will receive friends Wednesday, 2 to 5 and 7 to 9 PM at Williams Funeral Home, 5628 Bway at 232 St, Bronx. Mass of Christian Burial will be celebrated at St. John's Church (Kingsbridge) Thursday, 10:45 AM. Interment St. Mary's Cemetery, Yonkers, NY. Donations appreciated to the Rosary Hill Home 600 Linda Ave. Hawthorne, NY. 10532.
